comments:
Build 20020404

Had a snippet editor open.
Closed it
Opened a Java file
Selected a type name and hit F3.
Got the following walkback:

Looks like an accelerator / keybinding association problem, similar to what we 
saw with Backspace.

moving to JDT debug, the keybinding problem isn't th snippet editor problem, 
but the code code be more defensive to guard against the NPE - moving to debug

The JavaSnippetEditor now ensures that it has a source viewer.
Please verify (DarinW)
